title: cannot log in
body: I try to log in and it says authenticating... and then gives me the response "an unknown error has occurred, please try again". I used google to try and fix the problem. Used the hextech tool which reports everything is "OK" checked for any laptop errors on my end, as well as uninstall / reinstall. The same problem persists. Please help.

replies.body: Is this still happening for you?  It sounds like your connection is failing to reach our authentication server so it never picks up your login info.  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help get that fixed up.  Let me know if the problem persists, though!
